contents.description: The path of the new file. The path should be the absolute DBFS path.

overwrite.description: This parameter might be absent, and instead a posted file will be used.

401.description: The request does not have valid authentication credentials for the operation.

404.description: Operation was performed on a resource that does not exist.

post.description: Uploads a file through the use of multipart form post. It is mainly used for streaming uploads, but can also be used as a convenient single call for data upload.
